nodes.text: The Impetuous was a Raider-class corvette which served the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. At one point, the corvette, alongside a TIE Advanced x1, passed over a blue celestial body. The Impetuous measured 150 meters long and was equipped with sublight engines.

The Impetuous was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the Imperial Raider Expansion Pack, an expansion for Fantasy Flight Games' miniatures game Star Wars: Armada, on a card of the same name. The expansion was released on November 26, 2015.

The corvette was originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, appearing in the Imperial Raider Expansion Pack for Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game, also by Fantasy Flight Games. Its expansion was released on August 13, 2015.
